protein.specific_function: Tubulin-folding protein; involved in the first step of the tubulin folding pathway. Modulates microtubule dynamics by capturing GTP-bound beta-tubulin (TUBB)

reference.reference_text: Schubert A, Cattaruzza M, Hecker M, Darmer D, Holtz J, Morawietz H: Shear stress-dependent regulation of the human beta-tubulin folding cofactor D gene. Circ Res. 2000 Dec 8;87(12):1188-94.
